I chaired a meeting of the Council of Ministers today, during which we decided to establish an integrated national program to support small and medium enterprises http://t.co/qJGVAUo6w5

The program includes the establishment of a federal council for small and medium enterprises, and supporting young people with privileges and incentives in addition to technical, training and marketing support
Our goal is for the SME sector to constitute 70% of non-oil GDP by 2021, God willing
We also adopted today a national plan to promote medical research in the country in cooperation with the academic sector in order to better understand the health problems facing our society
We have adopted a national initiative to promote awareness of healthy living through physical activity, eating healthy food, not using tobacco, and combating childhood obesity

Today I changed a cabinet meeting during which we established an integrated national program to support SMEs
Program includes federal council for SMEs, privileges and incentives for entrepreneurs, technical training, marketing support for projects
Our goal is for the SME sector to grow and institute up to 70% of UAE's GDP (excluding the oil-sector) by 2021
We approved a national plan promoting medical research in cooperation with academia to better understand health problems facing UAE society
We approved new initiative promoting healthier lifestyle: physical activity, healthy eating, no smoking, and a fight against child obesity

I'll be making a speech today on how our One Nation government will always be on the side of people who work hard and do the right thing.
Everyone in our country should have the opportunity to get on and make a good life for themselves.
@LaryaThoma thank you. The future is determined and secured by what we do today!
There are 3 key drivers of opportunity - strong families, a first-rate education and a welfare system that encourages work.

Visiting the excellent Ormiston Bolingbroke Academy, Runcorn, where I am making a speech on our One Nation mission. http://t.co/9awAA6U2MT
PM speaking live now on the government's One Nation approach.
PM: Whoever you are, wherever you live, whatever your background or stage of life I believe this govt can help you fulfil your aspirations.
PM: I want everyone in this country to have the opportunity to get on & make a good life. That is the task for the next 5 years.
PM: Today I want to make a bigger, & deeper, argument about how we realise the One Nation ideal & help everyone achieve their full potential
PM: The right track to extend opportunity is to recognise the causes of stalled social mobility and a lack of economic opportunity.
PM: This is the change we need - to move from a low wage, high tax, high welfare society to a higher wage, lower tax, lower welfare society.
PM: Families are the best welfare system there is. In the next 5 years we will double free childcare for 3 & 4 yrs olds with working parents
PM: 117,000 families already turned around by the troubled families programme, 400,000 more families over next five years
PM: Next we need to improve ‘coasting schools’. We will turn around 1,000 more failing schools and improve hundreds more coasting schools.
PM: We will help more people back into work and increase the minimum wage to £6.70 from October 2015.
PM: By taking on govt failure & backing family, education & work we extend opportunity & could change the lives of many disadvantaged people
Read PM's speech on plans to help working families and extend opportunities to all in full: http://t.co/JmmW9xnlKr
